hymn.title: I wake up this morning, Lord

lyrics.stanza: I wake up this morning, Lord; The sun shines through my windowsill. How can I help but praise Your name! You're my Lord and King!
Because You...gave Your life up for me. The Spirit...You were raised to be. Now You are...living deep in me, As my hope of glory.
Each day Your mercies they are new, To me refreshing as the dew; You are my bountiful supply. Every morning You're nigh!
Your love flows out to me as grace, Enabling me to run the race; As truth You're my reality, As my all to be.
Each day the world I leave behind; You write Your laws upon my mind, Inscribing on my softened heart, Filling every part.
O Lord, I'm just a tree in You, Rooted and being built in You, Absorbing all You are to me, What a place to be!
